name: master-detail-crud
description: Master-detail CRUD pattern with list view and edit panel
page_layout: SidebarNav | DataTable (left) || DetailPanel (right); FilterBar above table; BulkActionBar at bottom
components_used: DataTable, FilterPanel, ComplexForm, PageHeader, StatusBadge, AlertDialog
user_flow: List → Select item → Detail view → Edit → Save/Cancel; Bulk select → Bulk action
best_practices: Use optimistic UI for inline edits; Show unsaved changes indicator; Confirm destructive actions; Support keyboard navigation
tags: crud master detail list edit admin

name: modal-crud
description: CRUD operations using modal dialogs from a list view
page_layout: PageHeader + FilterBar + DataTable; Create/Edit via Dialog overlay
user_flow: List → Click Add → Modal form → Save → Toast confirmation; List → Click row → Modal detail → Edit → Save
best_practices: Keep modals focused (max 5-6 fields); Pre-fill edit forms; Validate before submit; Close on successful save
tags: crud modal dialog form create edit

name: analytics-dashboard
description: Dashboard with KPI cards, charts, and data summary tables
page_layout: Grid: StatCards (top row) → Charts (middle, 2-col) → RecentActivity table (bottom)
user_flow: Land on dashboard → Review KPIs → Drill into chart → View data table → Export
best_practices: Show last-updated timestamp; Allow date range filtering; Lazy-load chart data; Provide drill-down links from KPIs

name: operational-dashboard
description: Real-time operational dashboard with status monitoring
page_layout: Grid: AlertBanner (top) → StatusGrid (middle) → ActivityStream (right sidebar)
user_flow: Monitor dashboard → Notice alert → Click for details → Take action → Return to monitoring
best_practices: Auto-refresh data (30s interval); Highlight critical items; Provide quick-action buttons; Show connection status

name: bulk-edit
description: Bulk editing pattern for modifying multiple records simultaneously
page_layout: DataTable with editable cells; BulkActionBar; Confirmation dialog
user_flow: Select rows → Click bulk action → Review changes → Confirm → Apply
best_practices: Show affected record count; Preview changes before applying; Allow undo; Validate all records before commit
tags: bulk edit batch modify multiple records

name: role-based-nav
description: Navigation that adapts based on user role and permissions
page_layout: SidebarNav with role-filtered items; PageHeader with role badge; Content area
user_flow: Login → Role-filtered nav renders → Navigate to permitted page → Unauthorized pages hidden
best_practices: Hide unauthorized nav items (don't disable); Show role indicator; Redirect unauthorized access; Audit role changes

name: data-export
description: Data export workflow with format selection and preview
page_layout: DataTable → ExportButton dropdown → Format selection → Preview → Download
user_flow: View data → Click export → Select format (CSV/XLSX/PDF) → Preview → Download
best_practices: Support partial export (selected rows); Show row count; Offer scheduled exports; Queue large exports
tags: export download csv xlsx pdf data

name: audit-trail
description: Audit log display pattern with filtering and detail expansion
page_layout: FilterBar → AuditLog timeline; Click entry → Expanded detail card
user_flow: View log → Filter by user/action/date → Click entry → See details → Export if needed
best_practices: Show who/what/when/where; Color-code by action type; Link to affected entity; Paginate large logs
tags: audit log trail activity history timeline

name: advanced-search
description: Advanced search with saved filters and suggestions
page_layout: SearchInput → Suggestion dropdown; Advanced filter toggle → FilterPanel sidebar
user_flow: Type query → See suggestions → Select or refine → Apply filters → View results → Save filter
best_practices: Debounce search (300ms); Show result count; Preserve filters on navigation; Support query syntax

name: settings-wizard
description: Multi-step settings configuration wizard
page_layout: Progress steps (top) → Section content (center) → Navigation buttons (bottom)
user_flow: Step 1: Basic → Step 2: Advanced → Step 3: Review → Save
best_practices: Validate each step before proceeding; Allow back navigation; Show summary before save; Persist draft state

name: comparison-view
description: Side-by-side comparison of two or more records
page_layout: Split view with synchronized scrolling; Difference highlighting
user_flow: Select items to compare → View side-by-side → Highlight differences → Choose preferred
best_practices: Highlight changed fields; Allow field-by-field merge; Support 2-4 items; Sticky column headers

name: import-wizard
description: Data import wizard with file upload, mapping, and validation
page_layout: Step 1: Upload → Step 2: Column mapping → Step 3: Validation → Step 4: Import
components_used: Button, Table, Select, Alert, Progress, Toast
user_flow: Upload file → Map columns → Validate → Review errors → Import → Summary
best_practices: Show validation errors per row; Allow partial import; Preview first 5 rows; Support CSV/XLSX
tags: import upload csv mapping validation wizard

name: notification-center
description: Centralized notification management with categories and actions
page_layout: Sheet panel from right; Tabs for categories; Notification list with actions
components_used: Sheet, Tabs, Badge, Button, Separator, Avatar
user_flow: Click bell icon → Sheet opens → Filter by category → Read/dismiss → Take action
best_practices: Group by date; Mark all as read; Badge unread count; Link to source; Auto-dismiss stale items

name: tree-crud
description: Hierarchical CRUD for nested data (org chart, categories)
page_layout: TreeView (left) → Detail panel (right); Add/move/delete via context menu
user_flow: Navigate tree → Select node → View/edit details → Add child → Drag to rearrange
best_practices: Lazy-load children; Expand/collapse all; Breadcrumb trail; Confirm moves
tags: tree hierarchy nested org category crud

name: kanban-board
description: Kanban board for status-based workflow management
page_layout: Column grid: one column per status; Draggable cards between columns
user_flow: View board → Drag card to new status → Card updates → Filter/search
best_practices: Limit WIP per column; Show card count; Quick-add card; Filter by assignee
tags: kanban board workflow status drag drop

name: batch-upload
description: Batch file upload with progress tracking
page_layout: Upload zone → File list with progress bars → Summary
user_flow: Drag files → Upload starts → Monitor progress → Review results
best_practices: Show per-file progress; Allow cancel; Validate file type/size; Resume failed uploads

name: global-search
description: App-wide search via command palette
page_layout: Ctrl+K → CommandPalette overlay → Categorized results → Navigate
user_flow: Press Ctrl+K → Type query → See categorized results → Select → Navigate
best_practices: Group results by type; Show recent searches; Keyboard navigation; Shortcut hints

name: detail-page
description: Entity detail page with tabs, related data, and action header
page_layout: PageHeader → TabNav → Tab content (Info/Activity/Settings/Related)
components_used: PageHeader, TabNav, Card, DataTable, AuditLog, Badge, Button
user_flow: Navigate to entity → View summary → Switch tabs → Edit → Save
best_practices: Lazy-load tab content; Show key info in header; Quick actions in header; Breadcrumb navigation
tags: detail page entity view tabs info

name: booking-wizard
description: Multi-step hotel booking flow with summary sidebar
page_layout: ProgressSteps (top) → StepContent (left 60%) || BookingSummary (right 40%); Mobile: full-width steps with collapsible summary
components_used: BookingWizard, DateRangePicker, GuestForm, PriceDisplay, BookingSummary, Button
user_flow: Search → Select room → Choose dates → Guest info → Payment → Confirmation
best_practices: Show total at every step; Allow date changes throughout; Auto-save progress; Mobile-first layout

name: room-browser
description: Room search and filtering with map or list view toggle
page_layout: SearchBar (top) → FilterPanel (left) || RoomCards grid/list (right); Map toggle
components_used: SearchBar, FilterPanel, RoomCard, MapView, Pagination, Badge
user_flow: Search → Filter by amenities/price/rating → Toggle map/list → Select room → View details
best_practices: Show result count; Sort by relevance/price/rating; Infinite scroll or pagination; Preserve scroll position
tags: search room browse filter map list

name: availability-calendar
description: Calendar-based availability and pricing display
page_layout: Month navigation → Calendar grid; Color-coded cells; Rate display per cell
user_flow: Select month → View availability → Click date → See rates → Select dates
best_practices: Color-code: green=available, yellow=limited, red=sold out; Show price per night; Min-stay indicators

name: guest-check-in
description: Self-service or front-desk guest check-in flow
page_layout: Step 1: ID verification → Step 2: Room assignment → Step 3: Key card → Step 4: Welcome
components_used: GuestForm, BookingWizard, Card, Badge, Button, Toast
user_flow: Find booking → Verify identity → Assign room → Issue key → Welcome package
best_practices: Auto-fill from reservation; Photo ID upload; Mobile-optimized; Complete in under 90 seconds

name: rate-management
description: Rate and inventory management interface for hotel staff
page_layout: Calendar grid → Bulk rate editor; Season/rate plan tabs; Audit trail
components_used: DataTable, AvailabilityCalendar, ComplexForm, TabNav, Badge, AlertDialog
user_flow: Select date range → Edit rates → Apply rules → Review changes → Publish
best_practices: Bulk date selection; Rate plan templates; Change preview; Rollback support; Audit all changes
tags: rate management pricing inventory calendar admin

name: room-detail
description: Detailed room information page with gallery, amenities, and booking CTA
page_layout: RoomGallery (top) → RoomInfo + AmenityList (left) || BookingSummary (right sticky)
components_used: RoomGallery, AmenityList, PriceDisplay, ReviewCard, BookingSummary, Button
user_flow: Browse rooms → Click room → View gallery → Check amenities → Read reviews → Book
best_practices: Lazy-load gallery; Show availability inline; Highlight key amenities; Show recent reviews
tags: room detail page gallery amenity review

name: payment-flow
description: Secure payment processing with multiple payment methods
page_layout: Payment method tabs → Form → Review → Process → Confirmation
components_used: Card, Tabs, ComplexForm, PriceDisplay, Button, Alert, Toast
user_flow: Select payment method → Enter details → Review total → Confirm → Processing → Success
best_practices: Show secure badge; Support multiple methods; PCI compliance indicators; Clear error messages

name: review-listing
description: Guest review listing with ratings and management tools
page_layout: Review summary → Filter/sort → Review cards → Pagination
user_flow: View summary → Filter by rating → Read reviews → (Staff: respond to review)
best_practices: Sort by date/rating; Filter by score; Show verified badge; Paginate (10 per page)
tags: review listing rating filter sort pagination

name: hotel-dashboard
description: Hotel management dashboard with occupancy and revenue metrics
page_layout: StatCards (top) → OccupancyChart + RevenueChart (middle) → TodayCheckins table (bottom)
user_flow: View metrics → Check occupancy → Review today's activity → Drill into details
best_practices: Show occupancy percentage; Revenue vs. target; Today's check-ins/outs; Quick links to management

name: reservation-form
description: Manual reservation creation for front desk staff
page_layout: Guest search → Room selection → Date/rate → Special requests → Confirm
components_used: SearchInput, GuestForm, AvailabilityCalendar, PriceDisplay, ComplexForm, Button
user_flow: Search guest → Select/create guest → Pick room → Set dates → Add notes → Confirm
best_practices: Auto-complete returning guests; Show real-time availability; Calculate total instantly; Send confirmation

name: onboarding-tour
description: First-time user onboarding with feature highlights
page_layout: Overlay with tooltip pointers → Feature cards → Progress indicator
user_flow: Welcome → Feature 1 → Feature 2 → ... → Complete → Dashboard
best_practices: Max 5 steps; Skip option always visible; Don't repeat for returning users; Contextual help after

name: loyalty-program
description: Loyalty program tier display with points and benefits
page_layout: Tier card → Points balance → Benefits list → Earning history
user_flow: View tier → Check points → Browse benefits → View history → Redeem
best_practices: Show tier progress bar; Next tier requirements; Points expiry notice; Redemption options
tags: loyalty program tier points rewards benefits

name: cancellation-flow
description: Booking cancellation with policy display and refund calculation
page_layout: Policy display → Refund calculation → Reason selection → Confirmation
components_used: Card, Alert, Select, PriceDisplay, AlertDialog, Button, Toast
user_flow: View booking → Click cancel → See policy → Review refund → Select reason → Confirm
best_practices: Show cancellation deadline; Calculate refund clearly; Offer alternatives; Confirm with dialog

name: destination-search
description: Destination search with autocomplete and popular suggestions
page_layout: SearchBar → Autocomplete dropdown → Popular destinations grid → Recent searches
user_flow: Type destination → See autocomplete → Select → Proceed to rooms
best_practices: Show popular destinations; Recent searches; Autocomplete with location types; Photo previews

name: room-comparison
description: Side-by-side room type comparison with features and pricing
page_layout: Comparison table with room types as columns; Feature rows; Pricing at bottom
user_flow: Select rooms → View comparison → Compare features → Select preferred → Book
best_practices: Max 3-4 rooms; Highlight differences; Show best value; Sticky header with CTAs
tags: comparison room type feature pricing select

name: special-requests
description: Guest special request form with predefined options and custom text
page_layout: Checkbox grid for common requests → Textarea for custom → Priority toggle
user_flow: Select common requests → Add custom notes → Set priority → Submit
best_practices: Categorize requests; Show fulfillment status; Time-stamp submissions; Staff notification

name: invoice-detail
description: Detailed invoice breakdown with print/download options
page_layout: Invoice header → Line items table → Tax breakdown → Total → Actions
user_flow: View invoice → Review items → Check taxes → Print/download → Email to guest
best_practices: Itemized charges; Tax breakdown; Payment status; Multi-currency display; PDF export
tags: invoice detail breakdown charges print download

name: property-switcher
description: Multi-property navigation for chain hotel management
page_layout: Dropdown selector → Property card → Switch confirmation
user_flow: Click property name → See dropdown → Select property → Confirm → Context switches
best_practices: Show current property clearly; Recent properties; Search within list; Visual property badges
tags: property switch hotel chain multi-property navigation

name: responsive-sidebar
description: Responsive sidebar that collapses to drawer on mobile
page_layout: Desktop: fixed sidebar || content; Mobile: hamburger → Sheet drawer
user_flow: Desktop: click nav items; Mobile: tap hamburger → drawer opens → tap item → drawer closes
best_practices: Animate transitions; Persist collapsed state; Keyboard accessible; Show active page indicator

name: form-wizard
description: Multi-step form wizard with progress and validation
page_layout: ProgressSteps → FormStep content → Back/Next buttons
user_flow: Fill step 1 → Validate → Next → ... → Review → Submit
best_practices: Validate per step; Allow back without losing data; Show progress; Summary before submit

name: search-suggestions
description: Search with typeahead suggestions and recent queries
page_layout: SearchInput → Dropdown with suggestions/recent → Results
user_flow: Type → See suggestions → Select or search → View results
best_practices: Debounce 300ms; Show recent searches; Categorize suggestions; Keyboard navigation

name: empty-state
description: Empty state with contextual illustration and primary action
page_layout: Centered: Icon → Title → Description → Action button
user_flow: Land on empty page → See empty state → Click action → Create first item
best_practices: Contextual illustration; Clear next step; Secondary help link; Match page purpose

name: loading-skeleton
description: Content loading with skeleton placeholders matching layout
page_layout: Skeleton shapes matching expected content layout
user_flow: Page loads → Skeletons shown → Data arrives → Content replaces skeletons
best_practices: Match content layout; Animate pulse; Replace progressively; Show after 200ms delay

name: error-boundary
description: Error display with retry option and help link
page_layout: Centered: Error icon → Title → Description → Retry button → Help link
user_flow: Error occurs → Error state shown → User clicks retry → Content reloads
best_practices: Show error code; Offer retry; Link to status page; Don't lose user context

name: confirmation-dialog
description: Action confirmation dialog with consequences display
page_layout: AlertDialog: Warning icon → Title → Consequence description → Cancel/Confirm buttons
user_flow: Click dangerous action → Dialog shows → Read consequences → Confirm or cancel
best_practices: Show what will happen; Use destructive variant for delete; Require typed confirmation for critical actions

name: tab-navigation
description: Tab-based content organization with lazy loading
page_layout: TabNav → Tab content panels
user_flow: Click tab → Content loads → Interact → Switch tab → Previous state preserved
best_practices: Lazy-load inactive tabs; Preserve state on switch; Show loading indicator; URL-based tab selection
tags: tab navigation content switch organize lazy

name: pagination
description: Paginated data display with page size selection
page_layout: DataTable → Pagination bar with page controls and size selector
user_flow: Browse page → Navigate → Change page size → Jump to page
best_practices: Show total count; Configurable page size; Keyboard navigation; URL-based page state
tags: pagination page navigate data table controls
